casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Robert K. STEWART 274P15-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2018

Robert K. Stewart, Pro Se.

Amy Kunstling Irene, Special Deputy Attorney General, Maureen Krueger, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th of June 2018 by Defendant for Hearing En Banc:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."
